      • convertToEntityAndSaveKanbanBoard

        public KanbanBoardEntity convertToEntityAndSaveKanbanBoard​(fr.istic.sir.kanban.aarzel.model.KanbanBoardDTO kanbanBoardDTO)
                                                    throws DatabaseFetchException
        Converts a KanbanBoardDTO to an entity, and adds 3 sections to it. Every time we create a KanbanBoard, it will be initialised with 3 KanbanSections. This method calls the repository, and throw an exception if an error happens.
        Parameters:
        kanbanBoardDTO - the DTO passed from the client to the server
        Returns:
        the created KanbanBoard in db
        Throws:
        DatabaseFetchException - if there is a database error
